title: Protest erupts outside GR’s son’s house in LA
body_lines: A small group of protestors have gathered outside President Gotabaya Rakapaksa's son's house in Los Angeles, USA, with protestors calling on him to call his father back home.
The protester said that President Gotabaya had to go down and his money had to come back.  The protester said that people in Los Angeles are with Sri Lankans.
